extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of REX 200 or REX 250.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system version less than 7.3.2?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Version 7.3.2
extracted_playbook.description: Update the system to version 7.3.2 to mitigate vulnerabilities.
